import React, {useContext, useState} from 'react' import Signinbtn from '../SignIn-Btn/Signinbtn' import {UserContext} from '../Context/userContext' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import "./Navbar.css" const Navbar = () => { const [user, setUser] = useContext(UserContext).user; const [dropdown, setDropdown] = useState(false) const handleClick = () => { setDropdown(!dropdown) } const reloadPage = () => { window.location.reload() } console.log(dropdown) return (

React Social

{user ? (

{user.displayName}

Logout

) : }
) } export default Navbar
